def fibonacci(n, memo={}):
    if n in memo:
        return memo[n]
    if n <= 2:
        return 1
    memo[n] = fibonacci(n - 1, memo) + fibonacci(n - 2, memo)
    return memo[n]

def factorial(n):
    if n <= 1:
        return 1
    return n * factorial(n - 1)

print(f"Fibonacci(10): {fibonacci(10)}")
print(f"Factorial(5): {factorial(5)}")
